p: We would like to thank Ginger Shultz and Michelle Smith for assistance as we began this study, Holly Derry and Cindee Giffen for feedback on the survey, Holly Derry, Cindee Giffen, Jo Kurdziel, and Kyle Schulz for assistance in carrying out the survey, and Kyle Schulz for assistance with innumerable data requests. We also thank two anonymous reviewers for their comments on an earlier draft of this manuscript. This project was designed and the survey conducted while MAD was a AAAS Leshner Fellow for Public Engagement, and the data analyzed and manuscript drafted while she was a sabbatical fellow at the University of Michigan's Office of Academic Innovation. This study was reviewed by the University of Michigan's Institutional Review Board and deemed exempt (HUM00135237).
